text: @AyannaPressley Good question. Instead trying to #ImpeachTrumpAgain for his high crimes & misdemeanors (#COVID19 gross negligence, #ObstructionOfJustice, #TRE45ON w.r.t. militant White Supremacists & Russia) @SpeakerPelosi, @RepAdamSchiff @HouseJudiciary have essentially allowed him to run amok.
